DOC.brief_summary: To assess efficacy enfuvirtide ( Fuzeon ) add HAART compare treatment HAART alone achieve maintain viral load suppression .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Evaluate Safety Efficacy Adding Enfuvirtide Oral Highly Active Antiretroviral Therapy ( HAART ) Human Immunodeficiency Virus ( HIV ) Patients With Prior Treatment Experience
DOC.detailed_description: This study consist two phase . In Induction phase patient randomize Baseline 1 ( BL1 ) 1:2 ratio receive : - I1 : HAART - I2 : Enfuvirtide ( 90 mg twice day ) + HAART . Participants achieve viral suppression < 50 copies/mL week 24 , confirm week 28 early , qualified enter Maintenance Phase start Baseline 2 ( BL2 ) , four week confirmation response . The Maintenance Phase consist three treatment group : - M1 : HAART continue ( patient I1 ) Patients ENF+HAART ( I2 ) re-randomized ( 1:1 ratio ) BL2 : - M2 : Enfuvirtide stop HAART continue - M3 : Enfuvirtide + HAART continue . The duration Maintenance Phase BL2 48 week BL1 . BL2 could start early Week 12 late Week 32 .
DOC.criteria: HIV1 infect adult > =18 year age ; currently antiretroviral ( ARV ) therapy ; previously treat 2 3 different antiretroviral class ; HIV1 Ribonucleic acid ( RNA ) > =1,000 copies/mL ; Cluster differentiation antigen four ( CD4 ) lymphocyte count > =200 cells/mm^3 ; female childbearing potential must willing use reliable form effective barrier contraception duration study 30 day last dose study drug . history prior use enfuvirtide T1249 ; woman pregnant , breastfeed plan become pregnant study ; active , untreated opportunistic infection ; patient treatment interruption , patient interrupt ARV therapy within 4 week screen screen period reason either toxicity management .
